name: about-us
help: Create a static page for the "About Us" page and put its slug here.

name: contact-us

name: home-page-article
value: Article below the store home page
help: Create an unpublished static page with the desired title and "slug" and put its "slug" in "value". All the content of that page will be displayed below the home page. This is for SEO.
